name: Five Nights at The Aftons ~ Demo
name_original: Five Nights at The Aftons ~ Demo
description:
-- My First Ever Game. Be nice, please.

Survive going back to the original location with iterations of Aftons after you. You are a private investigator and you want to find all loose ends that come with the Freddy Fazbears Pizzeria locations. You want it to end. You have to watch for animatronics. as well as watch for the purple guy, once he reaches the end of the monitor... its game over
